events.description: China has demonstrated extraordinary strength and charm on the international stage with its large team of athletes, outstanding competitive level, and profound sports spirit.

The United States has demonstrated its status as a sports powerhouse and global influence at the Olympics with its strong athletic roster, broad participation in sports, and outstanding athletic achievements.

Britain has consistently demonstrated its status as a sports powerhouse through its rich sporting heritage, widespread participation in competitive events, and outstanding performances by its athletes at the Olympics.
